name: Gungun
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Welcome, my love, to this special place, A digital treasure, just for your grace. As you scroll, you’ll find a clue, That leads you to where dreams come true… Your final clue is where dreams take flight, Where love and warmth feel just right…
replayText: Touch me and we go again!
